pma:database.name: cs4750em2ae
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `arranges` ( `league_id` int(4) DEFAULT NULL, `game_id` int(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`game_id`), KEY `league_id` (`league_id`), CONSTRAINT `arranges_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`game_id`) REFERENCES `Game` (`game_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `arranges_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`league_id`) REFERENCES `League` (`league_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `Captain` ( `team_id` int(5) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `captain` varchar(7) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`team_id`), UNIQUE KEY `team_id` (`team_id`), KEY `captain` (`captain`), CONSTRAINT `Captain_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`team_id`) REFERENCES `Team` (`team_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `Captain_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`captain`) REFERENCES `User` (`user_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `contest` ( `team_id` int(5) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `league_id` int(4) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`team_id`), KEY `league_id` (`league_id`), CONSTRAINT `contest_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`team_id`) REFERENCES `Team` (`team_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `contest_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`league_id`) REFERENCES `League` (`league_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `divided_into` ( `sport_name` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `league_id` int(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`league_id`), KEY `sport_name` (`sport_name`), CONSTRAINT `divided_into_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`league_id`) REFERENCES `League` (`league_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `divided_into_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`sport_name`) REFERENCES `Sport` (`sport_name`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `Game` ( `game_id` int(6) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `game_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `game_time` time DEFAULT NULL, `game_location` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `team1_id` int(5) DEFAULT NULL, `team2_id` int(5) DEFAULT NULL, `team1_score` int(3) DEFAULT NULL, `team2_score` int(3) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`game_id`), UNIQUE KEY `game_id` (`game_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=13 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
pma:database.pma:view: CREATE ALGORITHM=UNDEFINED DEFINER=`cs4750em2ae`@`%` SQL SECURITY DEFINER VIEW `cs4750em2ae`.`leaders` AS select `cs4750em2ae`.`League`.`sport_name` AS `sport_name`,`cs4750em2ae`.`League`.`league_type` AS `league_type`,`cs4750em2ae`.`League`.`league_id` AS `league_id`,`cs4750em2ae`.`Schedule`.`end_date` AS `end_date`,`cs4750em2ae`.`Team`.`team_name` AS `team_name`,`cs4750em2ae`.`Stats`.`wins` AS `wins`,`cs4750em2ae`.`Stats`.`losses` AS `losses`,`cs4750em2ae`.`Stats`.`draws` AS `draws`,`cs4750em2ae`.`Stats`.`ncs` AS `ncs` from ((((`cs4750em2ae`.`Team` join `cs4750em2ae`.`Stats` on((`cs4750em2ae`.`Team`.`team_id` = `cs4750em2ae`.`Stats`.`team_id`))) join `cs4750em2ae`.`League`) join `cs4750em2ae`.`contest` on(((`cs4750em2ae`.`Team`.`team_id` = `cs4750em2ae`.`contest`.`team_id`) and (`cs4750em2ae`.`League`.`league_id` = `cs4750em2ae`.`contest`.`league_id`)))) join `cs4750em2ae`.`Schedule` on((`cs4750em2ae`.`League`.`league_id` = `cs4750em2ae`.`Schedule`.`league_id`))) where (`cs4750em2ae`.`Stats`.`wins` = (select max(`cs4750em2ae`.`Stats`.`wins`) from (((`cs4750em2ae`.`Team` join `cs4750em2ae`.`Stats` on((`cs4750em2ae`.`Team`.`team_id` = `cs4750em2ae`.`Stats`.`team_id`))) join `cs4750em2ae`.`League`) join `cs4750em2ae`.`Schedule` on((`cs4750em2ae`.`League`.`league_id` = `cs4750em2ae`.`Schedule`.`league_id`)))));
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `League` ( `league_id` int(4) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `league_type` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `sport_name` varchar(20) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`league_id`,`sport_name`), UNIQUE KEY `league_id` (`league_id`), KEY `sport_name` (`sport_name`), CONSTRAINT `League_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`sport_name`) REFERENCES `Sport` (`sport_name`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=334 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `member_of` ( `user_id` varchar(7) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `team_id` int(5) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`user_id`,`team_id`), KEY `team_id` (`team_id`), CONSTRAINT `member_of_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `User` (`user_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `member_of_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`team_id`) REFERENCES `Team` (`team_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `Schedule` ( `league_id` int(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `start_date` date NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00', `end_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `reg_deadline` date DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`league_id`,`start_date`), CONSTRAINT `Schedule_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`league_id`) REFERENCES `League` (`league_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `Stats` ( `team_id` int(5) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `played` int(2) DEFAULT NULL, `wins` int(2) DEFAULT NULL, `losses` int(2) DEFAULT NULL, `draws` int(2) DEFAULT NULL, `ncs` int(2) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`team_id`), CONSTRAINT `Stats_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`team_id`) REFERENCES `Team` (`team_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `Team` ( `team_id` int(5) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `team_name` varchar(20) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`team_id`), UNIQUE KEY `team_id` (`team_id`), UNIQUE KEY `team_name` (`team_name`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=9 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `User` ( `user_id` varchar(7) NOT NULL, `password` varchar(32) NOT NULL, `last_name` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `first_name` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `address` varchar(60) DEFAULT NULL, `phone` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `email` varchar(30) DEFAULT NULL, `admin` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `gender` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`user_id`), UNIQUE KEY `user_id` (`user_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
pma:database.pma:procedure: CREATE DEFINER=`cs4750em2ae`@`%` PROCEDURE `LeagueTeams`(IN leagueType VARCHAR(20), IN sportName VARCHAR(20)) BEGIN SELECT team_name FROM Team NATURAL JOIN contest NATURAL JOIN League WHERE sport_name = sportName and league_type = leagueType; END

CREATE DEFINER=`cs4750em2ae`@`%` PROCEDURE `LeagueTeamsFull`(IN leagueType VARCHAR(20), IN sportName VARCHAR(20)) BEGIN SELECT * FROM Team NATURAL JOIN contest NATURAL JOIN League WHERE sport_name = sportName and league_type = leagueType; END

CREATE DEFINER=`cs4750em2ae`@`%` PROCEDURE `TeamRoster`(IN teamName VARCHAR(20)) BEGIN SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM User NATURAL JOIN member_of NATURAL JOIN Team WHERE team_name = teamName; END
